example.text: "What we saw tonight was a series of extremely irresponsible decisions that put a sexual abuse victim at risk...in front of a national audience, and I could not have disagreed with it more. It was shameful." [[url]]
?Today, almost exactly 3 years after we introduced this resolution, the FDA changed its policy to end discrimination against gay and bisexual men donating blood. [[url]]

"What we saw tonight was a series of extremely irresponsible decisions that put a sexual abuse victim at risk...in front of a national audience, and I could not have disagreed with it more. It was shameful." [[url]]
?Today, almost exactly 3 years after we introduced this resolution, the FDA changed its policy to end discrimination against gay and bisexual men donating blood. [[url]]
Last year, Democrats presented a bill to penalize companies who were price gouging during the middle of Putin's war on Ukraine. My colleagues on the other side of the aisle voted against that, too.
?Today, almost exactly 3 years after we introduced this resolution, the FDA changed its policy to end discrimination against gay and bisexual men donating blood. [[url]]
